summary: This is a subpoena issued by Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney to Jordana Feldman, commanding the production of documents from the Epstein Victim's Compensation Program (EVCP). The subpoena seeks all materials related to accusers, including claim forms, communications, payment records, and releases, to be produced in court.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in criminal case 20CR330, whose defense attorney is requesting this subpoena for documents from the Epstein Victim's Compensation Program.

persons.name: Jordana Feldman
persons.context: The person to whom the subpoena is directed, commanded to produce documents from the Epstein Victim's Compensation Program.

persons.name: Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell who requested this subpoena, from the law firm Haddon, Morgan & Foreman P.C.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the document as someone whom accusers have accused of misconduct, alongside Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Pagliuca is listed as the attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell, who requested this subpoena on her behalf.
Both are named together as individuals whom accusers have accused of misconduct in the context of the Epstein Victim's Compensation Program.

events.title: Subpoena Issuance for EVCP Documents
events.description: A subpoena is issued commanding Jordana Feldman to produce documents from the Epstein Victim's Compensation Program for Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal case.

locations: United States District Court, Southern District of New York, Courtroom 318, 40 Foley Square, New York, NY 10007
Denver, Colorado 80203 (address of Jeffrey S. Pagliuca's law firm)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team subpoenaed documents from the Epstein Victim's Compensation Program (EVCP) in November 2021.
The subpoena seeks all EVCP materials related to accusers, including claim forms, communications, payment records, and releases.
The document reveals the defense strategy of seeking information about victims' compensation claims and releases in Maxwell's criminal case.
Jeffrey S. Pagliuca of Haddon, Morgan & Foreman P.C. is identified as Maxwell's attorney requesting the subpoena.
The subpoena specifically mentions accusers of both Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
